pageContext.claim: “We've been in Syria for many years. You know, Syria was supposed to be a short-term hit -- just a very short-term hit. And we were supposed to be in and out.”
pageContext.analysis: There was no end date when President Obama sent the first deployment of 50 special ops forces to Syria in October 2015. Trump has at various times suggested an end date of four months or even as short as 30 days.
